channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Road is blocked by bollards, 21st December
item.description:
Here, I believe Millwall block the road with bollards covering around 20 meters in distance. I was wondering what the legalities of this are and can I as a resident just leave bollard outside my house so no one can park here?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elstree Hill, Shortlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Green plastic bin full of rubbish, 21st December
item.description:
This green plastic bin is always full of rubbish and it was never emptied. This green plastic bin must be removed from this spot completely and must be replaced with black litter bin for public streets.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kelly Avenue, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain cover broken. Like a bomd going off every time a car (.even loader for bus) drives over it. I cannot sleep it need fixing., 20th December

item.title: Black Bag - Children's Bedroom Furniture/accessories, 20th December
item.description:
It's been there overnight. Nothing, seems to deter lazy and uncaring people, from littering the streets where we live. There's a CCTV camera above the dry cleaners, why isn't the council looking at this footage to prosecute fly tippers? .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Station Road, Penge, Greater London
